h3. j.enumerators.LogLevel

* path: /core/enumerators/LogLevel.py

Iterrator for levels of log
1: end user message
2: operator message
3: stdout
4: stderr
5: tracing 1 and/or backtrace python
6: tracing 2
7: tracing 3
8: tracing 4
9: tracing 5
10: special level, is the marker level
